title: Roasted pork fillet with spiced pork patties and chilli jam
description: Tender pork fillet and spicy patties are contrasted with the sweetness of chilli jam to make a rich dish perfect for chilly winter months.You will need an oven-proof frying pan, a steamer and a food processor for this recipe.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
5cm/2in fresh root ginger, peeled and grated
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 lemongrass stems, tough outer leaves removed, finely chopped
